text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump "Make this go away." Trump talks about Covid-19 as if it were a mere termite invasion. Just get an exterminator! Unfortunately, if we follow his psychotic logic, Trump gets to be the Terminex Man... and we get to be the termites. The dead ones.
